item.title: Need help with high alch
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zerk Owner Zerk
item.description:
@Owner_Zerk wrote:

[quote=“The Dark Abbys, post:4, topic:193619”]And the point in that post was…

did it make u feel like a good wanab mod?

ive been helping this forum constantly now for : 4 hrs 41 mins

i wouldnt mind asking for a bit of rep , up2 him if he gives or not

and i didnt ask, i sed it would be appreciated[/quote]

How am I being a wanna be mod, you dumbass?

You just got here. You know absolutely nothing about this community, and obviously skipped through the rules. I’m just pissed off that you go to every damn simple help topic, and help them with easy crap then ask for rep… And it’s also against the rules to talk about rep btw, so every if you weren’t asking you were still doing something.

You should really look here…

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3.0.html

Rule 5 - Rep:
Do not ask for rep, do not offer rep for services, do not give rep for meaningless messages. Rep shall not be abused.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with high alch
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zerk Owner Zerk
item.description:
@Owner_Zerk wrote:

[quote=“The Dark Abbys, post:2, topic:193619”]Hey there,

Firstly open your client.java

Now search for case 237: //Magic on items or just case 237:

Underneath it you should see int castOnSlot = inStream.readSignedWord(); int castOnItem = inStream.readSignedWordA(); int e3 = inStream.readSignedWord(); int castSpell = inStream.readSignedWordA(); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")){ println_debug("castOnSlot: "+castOnSlot+" castOnItem: "+castOnItem+" e3: "+e3+" castSpell: "+castSpell);} int alchvaluez = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(castOnItem, 0, castOnSlot)); //IF you do not have any of this add it in

So you should now see case 237: //Magic on Items int castOnSlot = inStream.readSignedWord(); int castOnItem = inStream.readSignedWordA(); int e3 = inStream.readSignedWord(); int castSpell = inStream.readSignedWordA(); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")){ println_debug("castOnSlot: "+castOnSlot+" castOnItem: "+castOnItem+" e3: "+e3+" castSpell: "+castSpell);} int alchvaluez = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(castOnItem, 0, castOnSlot)); // if not add it in underneath your case 218:

After this leave two spaces and add

[code]if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 55)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == true))
{
deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
addItem(995, alchvaluez);
addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[6]), 6);
setAnimation(712);
stillgfx(113, absY, absX);
resetanim = 12;
deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 1);
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 55)
{
sendMessage(“You need at least 55 Magic to cast High Level Alchemy”);
}
}

else if(castSpell == 1162) // low Alch
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -21)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 3)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)==true) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 3)==true))
{
alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 5);
deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
addItem(995, alchvaluez);
addSkillXP((320*playerLevel[6]), 6);
startAnimation(713);
stillgfxz2(5, absY, absX, 100, 1);
deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 1);
deleteItem(554,getItemSlot(554), 3);
newAnimDelay = 6;
newAnim = 712;
newAnimRequired = true;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 21)
{
sendMessage(“You need at least 21 Magic to cast Low Level Alchemy”);
}
}

[/code]

Good luck, and best wishes

Reputation would be grately appreciated (although i didnt do tht much :p)[/quote]

You aren’t allowed to ask for rep Smart one.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with high alch
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Hey there,

Firstly open your client.java

Now search for case 237: //Magic on items or just case 237:

Underneath it you should see int castOnSlot = inStream.readSignedWord(); int castOnItem = inStream.readSignedWordA(); int e3 = inStream.readSignedWord(); int castSpell = inStream.readSignedWordA(); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")){ println_debug("castOnSlot: "+castOnSlot+" castOnItem: "+castOnItem+" e3: "+e3+" castSpell: "+castSpell);} int alchvaluez = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(castOnItem, 0, castOnSlot)); //IF you do not have any of this add it in

So you should now see case 237: //Magic on Items int castOnSlot = inStream.readSignedWord(); int castOnItem = inStream.readSignedWordA(); int e3 = inStream.readSignedWord(); int castSpell = inStream.readSignedWordA(); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")){ println_debug("castOnSlot: "+castOnSlot+" castOnItem: "+castOnItem+" e3: "+e3+" castSpell: "+castSpell);} int alchvaluez = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(castOnItem, 0, castOnSlot)); // if not add it in underneath your case 218:

After this leave two spaces and add

[code]if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 55)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == true))
{
deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
addItem(995, alchvaluez);
addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[6]), 6);
setAnimation(712);
stillgfx(113, absY, absX);
resetanim = 12;
deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 1);
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 55)
{
sendMessage(“You need at least 55 Magic to cast High Level Alchemy”);
}
}

else if(castSpell == 1162) // low Alch
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -21)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 3)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1)==true) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 3)==true))
{
alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 5);
deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
addItem(995, alchvaluez);
addSkillXP((320*playerLevel[6]), 6);
startAnimation(713);
stillgfxz2(5, absY, absX, 100, 1);
deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 1);
deleteItem(554,getItemSlot(554), 3);
newAnimDelay = 6;
newAnim = 712;
newAnimRequired = true;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 21)
{
sendMessage(“You need at least 21 Magic to cast Low Level Alchemy”);
}
}

[/code]

Good luck, and best wishes

Reputation would be grately appreciated (although i didnt do tht much :p)

Read full topic
